message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000.
I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $15,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle
